LF016.LF016_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf17"/][UE:Meta key="09dbfff173a34b1baf089fe13490c2b7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]This is [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf17"/]Grace[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]is me![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Just drifting along
through space.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Wheee-ooo![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="09dbfff173a34b1baf089fe13490c2b7" Scale="1"/]Drifting...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]flying.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Floating...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]falling...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="09dbfff173a34b1baf089fe13490c2b7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]How long have I been out here?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Huh...
LF016.LF016_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf17"/][UE:Meta key="78b59a9d75f444e1abcf86a968f7f4ef" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]She's asked where she's from and where
she's going.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="78b59a9d75f444e1abcf86a968f7f4ef" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]Does the all-knowing space float have the
answers?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It floats along all whooshy...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
It does as it pleases...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="78b59a9d75f444e1abcf86a968f7f4ef" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Hmm?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Where is my floaty friend?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I...
LF016.LF016_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf17"/][UE:Meta key="8ea20c287adc4a3d9daf7417e812f0aa" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf17"/]Grace[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is friends with the darkness.[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
The darkness in space...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] No,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it's not
that scary.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Why would it be?
LF016.LF016_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf17"/][UE:Meta key="f56b47250b154666b9530fcff773c730" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Thinking back on my time as a leafling...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Was I a leaf?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Or was I me?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f56b47250b154666b9530fcff773c730" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]I don't remember much,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but I felt all leafy
inside...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] And my head was blank...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Just like
a leafy, leafy leaf.
LF016.LF016_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf17"/][UE:Meta key="6511bc98efdb43048d15be6b680cb7ff" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Baggage?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] No...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] All those things,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] they're
just noise.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] All kinds of rumbly rumblies.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6511bc98efdb43048d15be6b680cb7ff" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]The weight holds back the float...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] If I can't
float,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] then I can't drift.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6511bc98efdb43048d15be6b680cb7ff" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Traveling light is like freedom...
LF016.LF016_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf17"/][UE:Meta key="f45db82db9a841fe82cd2d4be53d1545" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I've been to all kinds of planets...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Just go
with the flow, and it's all good.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] But I always
go back to the big dark...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]to space.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f45db82db9a841fe82cd2d4be53d1545" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf17"/]Grace[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] belongs in the darkness...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Yes,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] she
belongs with the sparkly stars and the
glittering infinity...
LF016.LF016_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf17"/][UE:Meta key="ffe4f283356b413a9468efcadc61260a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]While adrift in space,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I've been picked up
a time or two by the intergalactic police...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ffe4f283356b413a9468efcadc61260a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="QuestionFaceOnly"/]Is she a lost child?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Or maybe a castaway,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
stranded...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ffe4f283356b413a9468efcadc61260a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]No,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf17"/]Grace[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] she's just a free spirit.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Just aaa-ooo...
LF016.LF016_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf17"/][UE:Meta key="c28cd6f4491048c7986aa3d169554780" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Gazing at the sky, lost in thoughts...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
It always feels surprisingly new...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Even
though the sky stays right where it is.
LF016.LF016_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf17"/][UE:Meta key="b447a100956145498bfa13ed648b1a13" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf17"/]Grace[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm not so good with all the
noisiness.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b447a100956145498bfa13ed648b1a13" Scale="1"/]I can't stay on this planet for too
much longer...
LF016.LF016_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf17"/][UE:Meta key="259d8f6927ef49a1beee6e0724cda0c2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]A goal...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf17"/]Grace[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s goal?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] No,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I don't have
anything like that.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="259d8f6927ef49a1beee6e0724cda0c2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Just being light in space...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That's
enough for me.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It feels...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]satisfying.[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
You should try it sometime.
LF016.LF016_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf17"/][UE:Meta key="9b31b3fd41ae4bd9b86789aa4ca34171" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Is this heaviness I feel...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]gravity?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Or do
I just miss the sky?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9b31b3fd41ae4bd9b86789aa4ca34171" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]No matter...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Here I am,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so here [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf17"/]Grace[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]
will wait.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] But space...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'd like to go back
there soon.
LF016.LF016_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf17"/][UE:Meta key="5d7631e312b54a95908397ed6c069789" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]She's asked where she's from and where

answers?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It floats along all whooshy...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
It does as it pleases...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5d7631e312b54a95908397ed6c069789" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Hmm?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Where is my floaty friend?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I...
LF016.LF016_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf17"/][UE:Meta key="b98d8ad0b15e4422a039cb9d63a6e589" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf17"/]Grace[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is friends with the darkness.[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
The darkness in space...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] No,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it's not
that scary.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Why would it be?
LF016.LF016_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf17"/][UE:Meta key="dd9ade6c731a49b88cc32d34b9d370d6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Thinking back on my time as a leafling...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Was I a leaf?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Or was I me?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="dd9ade6c731a49b88cc32d34b9d370d6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]I don't remember much,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but I felt all leafy
inside...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] And my head was blank...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Just like
a leafy, leafy leaf.
LF016.LF016_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_09:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf17"/][UE:Meta key="92efdf714a4746d08b29130851b2c84d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Baggage?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] No...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] All those things,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] they're

float,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] then I can't drift.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="92efdf714a4746d08b29130851b2c84d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Traveling light is like freedom...
LF016.LF016_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_10:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf17"/][UE:Meta key="4eea660089914154bdd1bbccddd75366" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I've been to all kinds of planets...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Just go
with the flow, and it's all good.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] But I always
go back to the big dark...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]to space.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4eea660089914154bdd1bbccddd75366" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf17"/]Grace[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] belongs in the darkness...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Yes,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] she
belongs with the sparkly stars and the
glittering infinity...
LF016.LF016_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf17"/][UE:Meta key="44381b5e19154e81b3a7b9189098f9fd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Is [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]so happy?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Are you content with
your life...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]hmm?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="44381b5e19154e81b3a7b9189098f9fd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]No troubles for you.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Good boy.
LF016.LF016_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf17"/][UE:Meta key="68299f831465473f865bd8c3f0a0f2cf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf17"/]Grace[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'd like to try riding on your
back myself,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]I would hate to
fall all over again.
LF016.LF016_Area500_Talk_Outro_T01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf17"/][UE:Meta key="cfe5ef725a724c029c1301dd011d33b3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]A [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf17"/]Grace[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]and another [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf17"/]Grace[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Do both
truly exist?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Perhaps the answer is right
here, within our hearts.
